
DATE: November 20, 1997.

CONTENTS:
This directory contains the CodeWarrior library
files for the PC.  Move the include and lib files
into the appropriate directories as recommended 
in the CodeWarrior documentaton.  Unzip the library
zip file using pkunzip or Winzip. (This is stored
as a zip form because the expanded files' names 
are not accepted by CDGEN 1.30, which is used to 
burn the CD-ROM.) 

This version includes the LIBPRESS 4.1.1 patch.
